name: Guesty
headline: The management platform for the short term rental industry.
description: Guesty’s property management software provides property managers and management companies with an end-to-end solution to simplify the complex operational needs of short term rentals. With Guesty, users can manage listings from multiple online travel agencies including Airbnb, Booking.com, Agoda and TripAdvisor, and utilize the company’s guest-centric tools including: Unified Inbox, Automation Tools, 24/7 Guest Communication Services, Payment Processing and more.

# Optimize your hospitality operations, maximize your revenue
Put the most advanced technology to work for you. Manage, automate, and streamline your business, all from one platform.
[![Get started](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/2950575/ae7b5d21-5a1c-4d82-a505-791b650bf021.png)](http://www.guesty.com/<https:/cta-redirect.hubspot.com/cta/redirect/2950575/ae7b5d21-5a1c-4d82-a505-791b650bf021>)
![](https://www.guesty.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/static-hp-hero-2.png)
## Proud to partner with
![](https://www.guesty.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/ABNB-Preferred-Partner-1.svg)
![](https://www.guesty.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/EXPEDIA-Preferred-Partner.svg)
![](https://www.guesty.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/BOOKING-Preferred-Partner.svg)
![](https://www.guesty.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/VRBO-Preferred-Partner-1.svg)
## Packages that work for every size of business
From a few listings to many, Guesty adapts to the scale and complexity of your operations
[Compare plans](http://www.guesty.com/</pricing/>)
#### [Lite For hosts who want to maximize earnings on autopilot ](http://www.guesty.com/</guestylite/>) #### [Pro For professionals ready to optimize their operations ](http://www.guesty.com/</pricing/>) #### [Enterprise For businesses in need of a customized, scalable solution ](http://www.guesty.com/</pricing/>)
## Manage and grow with the features you need
Channel Manager 
Guesty CRM 
Unified Inbox 
Multi-Calendar 
Payment Solutions 
Automation Tools 
Direct Reservations 
Revenue Management 
### Channel Manager
Manage your listings at scale with a centralized hub that lets you maximize performance across all channels
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/channel-manager/>)
### Guesty CRM
Collect, manage, and transform your reservation opportunities into satisfied guests all on one platform
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/crm/>)
### Unified Inbox
A single destination for guest communication, no matter what format or channel it's coming through
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/unified-inbox/>)
### Multi-Calendar
View, track, filter, and adjust your reservations in one place with a calendar that syncs the data from all of your listings 
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/multi-calendar/>)
### Payment Solutions
A full range of tools that simplifies the financial side of your business, from payment processing to revenue sharing
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/payment-solutions/>)
### Automation Tools
Save time and ensure nothing gets missed with automation on routine tasks like guest communication and pricing
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/automation-tools/>)
### Direct Reservations
A one-stop-shop to help you attract new business, control the guest experience, and increase your profits
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/direct-reservations/>)
### Revenue Management
Maximize revenue by applying your pricing strategy across all distribution channels from one centralized platform
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/revenue-management/>)
[All features](http://www.guesty.com/</features/>)
###### New release
## Now available: A new way to stay on top of messages
Your guests expect responses. Fast. Guesty ReplyAI delivers with AI-generated messages that understand context and are written in your unique voice.
[Book a demo](http://www.guesty.com/</start/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201030%20631'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Solutions for every property type
### Vacation rentals
Build your brand, optimize pricing, and add damage protection all from one platform. Guesty’s vacation rental software lets you manage every aspect of your business through the high season, low season, and in between.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</vacation-rental/>)
![Vacation rentals](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20845%20484'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Urban rentals
Maximize occupancy, streamline communication, and increase visibility all from one platform. Guesty’s urban rental software helps you stand out in the crowd and provide a better guest experience for city-break seekers.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</urban-rentals/>)
![Urban rental short term property](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20845%20484'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Aparthotels
Automate operations, optimize pricing, and manage multiple units all from one platform. Guesty’s Aparthotel software allows you to scale your business without having to sacrifice performance or guest experience.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</aparthotels-property-management-software/>)
![Aparthotels](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20845%20484'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Serviced apartments
Manage multiple units, maximize occupancy, and scale operations all from one platform. Guesty’s serviced apartments software makes switching between mid-term and short-term stays seamless. 
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</serviced-apartment-property-management-software/>)
![Serviced apartments](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20845%20484'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guesthouses and B&Bs
Boost visibility, streamline operations, and deliver a customized guest experience all from one platform. Guesty’s software for guesthouses and B&Bs provides the flexibility you need to make every stay memorable.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</bb-property-management-software/>)
![Guesthouses and B&Bs](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20845%20484'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Outdoor stays
Optimize revenue management, automate operations, and boost your brand all from one platform. Guesty’s software for outdoor stays gives you the strategies you need to make the most of the high season and stay ahead.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</outdoor-stays-property-management-software/>)
![Outdoor stays](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20845%20484'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Hospitality innovation built to grow with you
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### GuestyPay
Get a secure and frictionless payment experience with payment processing designed exclusively for the hospitality industry.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/guestypay/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20641'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Damage Protection
Report damage, settle and track claims, and gain peace of mind knowing you’re covered with friction-free damage protection.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/damage-protection/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guest Communication Services
Hand over guest communication to our experts who can offer accurate and timely support around the clock.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/guest-communication-management/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guesty Websites
Create your perfect direct booking site and get more direct reservations with our easy-to-use website builder.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/guesty-websites/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guesty PriceOptimizer
Maximize revenue with our automated price optimizer that responds to your unique market to give you the best nightly rate for your listings.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/guesty-priceoptimizer/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20434'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guesty Locks Manager
Streamline your smart locks management with automatic, unique code generation and real-time lock information all in one dashboard.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/guesty-locks-manager/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20516%20454'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Guesty Capital
Benefit from quick, fully transparent funding and dynamic, revenue-based payments to grow your business your way.
[Learn more](http://www.guesty.com/</features/guesty-capital/>)
## Integrations that drive results
Managing a successful business requires having the right tools. Guesty’s Marketplace ensures you have these tools at your fingertips. Seamlessly connect with online travel agencies and 150+ third-party solutions to keep things running smoothly, all in one place.
[Visit our marketplace](http://www.guesty.com/</integrations-marketplace/>)
## The global choice for propertymanagement software
Hospitality providers large and small use Guesty to deliver better value to guests and future-proof their business. From automating operations to driving bookings, Guesty simply lets you get more done.

### Channel Manager

### Guesty CRM
Collect, manage, and transform your reservation opportunities into satisfied guests all on one platform

Learn more⟨17⟩

View, track, filter, and adjust your reservations in one place with a calendar that syncs the data from all of your listings

### Payment Solutions
A full range of tools that simplifies the financial side of your business, from payment processing to revenue sharing

### Automation Tools
Save time and ensure nothing gets missed with automation on routine tasks like guest communication and pricing

## Solutions for every property type
### Vacation rentals
Build your brand, optimize pricing, and add damage protection all from one platform. Guesty’s vacation rental software lets you manage every aspect of your business through the high season, low season, and in between.
Learn more⟨34⟩
![Vacation rentals⟨72⟩]
### Urban rentals
Maximize occupancy, streamline communication, and increase visibility all from one platform. Guesty’s urban rental software helps you stand out in the crowd and provide a better guest experience for city-break seekers.
Learn more⟨73⟩
![Urban rental short term property⟨72⟩]
### Aparthotels
Automate operations, optimize pricing, and manage multiple units all from one platform. Guesty’s Aparthotel software allows you to scale your business without having to sacrifice performance or guest experience.
Learn more⟨74⟩
![Aparthotels⟨72⟩]
### Serviced apartments
Manage multiple units, maximize occupancy, and scale operations all from one platform. Guesty’s serviced apartments software makes switching between mid-term and short-term stays seamless. 
Learn more⟨75⟩
![Serviced apartments⟨72⟩]
### Guesthouses and B&Bs
Boost visibility, streamline operations, and deliver a customized guest experience all from one platform. Guesty’s software for guesthouses and B&Bs provides the flexibility you need to make every stay memorable.
Learn more⟨76⟩
![Guesthouses and B&Bs⟨72⟩]
### Outdoor stays
Optimize revenue management, automate operations, and boost your brand all from one platform. Guesty’s software for outdoor stays gives you the strategies you need to make the most of the high season and stay ahead.
Learn more⟨77⟩
![Outdoor stays⟨72⟩]

generated_description:
## Guesty: The Management Platform For Short-Term Rentals

**Overview:**
Founded in 2013 and a part of Y Combinator's Batch W14, Guesty operates out of Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, employing over 700 team members. Its mission is straightforward: to streamline the complex operational needs of the short-term rental industry through a comprehensive management platform.

**What Guesty Offers:**
At its core, Guesty provides property management software that helps rental managers and management companies centralize their operations across various online travel agencies, such as Airbnb, Booking.com, Agoda, and TripAdvisor. Key offerings include:

- **Unified Inbox**: A single thread for all guest communications.
- **Automation Tools**: For tasks like messaging and pricing.
- **24/7 Guest Communication Services**: Ensuring round-the-clock support.
- **Payment Processing**: Streamlining financial transactions.
- **Analytics and Reporting**: Gaining insights into property's performance.

Guesty really focuses on simplifying management so users can maximize their efficiency and guest satisfaction.

**Features:**
Guesty is packed with an array of features designed to cater to the multifaceted demands of property management:

- **Channel Management**: Synchronizes listings across all platforms.
- **Revenue Management**: Helps determine competitive pricing strategies and maximize occupancy.
- **Multi-Calendar**: Lets managers track bookings and availability in one integrated calendar.
- **GuestyCRM**: Manages guest data to enhance relationships and service.

The platform is adaptable to various types of properties, including vacation rentals, serviced apartments, urban rentals, guesthouses and B&Bs, aparthotels, and even outdoor stays.

**Add-Ons:**
- **Guesty Pay**: For seamless payment handling.
- **Guesty Capital**: For funding opportunities to grow your business.
- **Damage Protection**: Comprehensive coverage against potential damages.
- **Guest Communication Services**: Offloads guest interactions to experts.

**Why Choose Guesty?**
In the ever-evolving landscape of the short-term rental market, having an adaptable and comprehensive platform like Guesty can make all the difference. It not only centralizes operations but also equips property managers with the tools they need to thrive—metrics to measure success, flexibility to deploy strategies quickly, and the technology to automate tedious tasks.

Guesty is that partner you want when scaling your rental business while maintaining high levels of service and profitability.

For more details or to get started, you can visit [Guesty’s official website](http://www.guesty.com).
